channel.title: blogging on Hugo Theme Fuji
channel.description: Recent content in blogging on Hugo Theme Fuji

item.title: Blogging
item.description: What is the point of a blog? So I’m going to start blogging now. I think the main focus of this blog is going to be me rambling about my life. Where I come from, the things that are important to me. I’m going to try and be as non-confrontational as I can, but if you get offended you can always go somewhere else. I mean this is the internet…
